page.name: Geode Wand
page.description: A crystalmage was given a stone taken from inside a geode and set it in gold.  She then enchanted it to float and used it as a focus in this wand.

properties.name: Geode Wand
properties.description: A crystalmage was given a stone taken from inside a geode and set it in gold.  She then enchanted it to float and used it as a focus in this wand.

page.name: Purebred Protests
page.description: The birds in Lore are bitter and they're drowning out the songs of Zeuster's supplicants with cries of their own. Zeuster has asked you to silence them by any means necessary.

properties.name: Purebred Protests
properties.description: The birds in Lore are bitter and they're drowning out the songs of Zeuster's supplicants with cries of their own. Zeuster has asked you to silence them by any means necessary.
properties.complete: Appealing to their audience's ego works for Zeuster's supplicants, and now it's worked for you! It seems that full-fledged birds are susceptible to flattery, too.
